title: Non-Toxic Summer Essentials For The Whole Family

description: Low-Tox & Non-Toxic Summer Essentials Get ready for warm weather with low-tox and non-toxic summer essentials. Have fun in the sun without the harmful chemicals!

Summer is here and it's the perfect time to swap out all of your summer products that contain toxic chemicals for safer products. Toxic chemicals are a part of our everyday lives, but we can reduce our exposure to harmful chemicals by choosing products that aren't loaded with [endocrine disruptors](https://umbelorganics.com/endocrine-disrupting-chemicals/), carcinogens and other toxic chemicals. Before you head out for some warm weather fun, take inventory of all of your favorite and most-used products for summer living. Read the ingredients and double check them in a clean living app or on the [Environmental Working Group](https://www.ewg.org/sunscreen/) website. Below I'm sharing all of my favorite non-toxic and low-tox products that are perfect for fun in the sun without the harmful chemicals! Conventional body care products can be loaded with [endocrine disruptors](https://umbelorganics.com/endocrine-disrupting-chemicals/) and other harmful chemicals. Take good care of your body and look for products without ingredients like parabens, phthalates and ethoxylated ingredients. lotion](https://umbelorganics.com/kids-non-toxic-lotion/), and sunless some of my non-toxic body care favorites: [Humble Rosemary & Mint Deodorant](https://amzn.to/3oRsMZf)- Just 4 simple ingredients, plus essential oils and botanical extracts to create a variety of scents. Non-Toxic Sun Protection It's important to pay attention to both active and inactive ingredients in your sunscreen. Chemical sunscreen ingredients like oxybenzone are readily absorbed through the skin, and behave like a hormone disruptors. Look for non-nano zinc oxide as the active ingredient in your sunscreen. There are lots of great [mineral sunscreen](https://umbelorganics.com/mineral-sunscreen-for-kids-babies/) brands on the market. [Earth Mama Kids Mineral Sunscreen SPF40](https://bit.ly/3P5VAbb)- Contains zinc oxide for broad spectrum sun protection. Free from chemicals that are potentially harmful to people and the planet like oxybenzone or octinoxate, artificial fragrance, nano particles or parabens. Outdoor Eating & Entertaining Summer is time for firing up the barbie and enjoying outdoor living. If acidic or hot food is placed on a melamine dish, melamine, which contains formaldehyde, can leach from the dish into the food, and has been detected in urine of those eating off melamine plates.
